content: I can't find any specific documentation about the exponential formatter so I want to ask before possibly submitting an issue - are those inconsistencies expected? Especially how 25i32 yields 3.e1 but 25f64 - 2e1 image.png

That doesn't look like something I would expect. Especially the extra .. The different in rounding is also curious. I did see #70336 mentioning inconsistent rounding behavior, but I'm uncertain if that is related.

I would just file an issue.
